become an
activist

we turn
your
passion
into action

At Ours, we make our priority not business, but philanthropy. When you purchase Ours, you’re not buying a product, you’re participating in activism. So while we help you pursue your passion of exploring the American outdoors, you’re helping us find and deport illegal aliens. Leave it up to us; we think of it as a “do good tax” on all our products. What they pack in cost they more than make up for in their service to the American environment.

don’t worry. we’ll take care of the messy stuff.

all you need to do

is keep
exploring

healthy boundaries shop now ours, simply
